text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock If course he'll be criticised, he's emailed all his party members to encourage them to get tested so he can "win the race". We need consistent high levels of testing, contact tracing & forced isolation/quarantine. But there is little point if there is no vaccine available 😔
